data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Pseudomegischus van Achterberg from China (Hymenoptera, Stephanidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Hua-yan, Hong, Chun-dan, van Achterberg, Cornelis, Xu, Zai-fu (2016): Description of a new species of Pseudomegischus van Achterberg from China (Hymenoptera, Stephanidae). ZooKeys 601: 119-125, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.601.9499, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.601.9499
